text: Pen Jon nop ned nag lɨl, paklɨlak takaw ak, anɨgɨl mɨdeb. Helod ne tɨkjakɨl, nɨmam Pilip bin ne Helodiyas nop ak pɨlɨg dak. Pɨlɨg dek nɨm, Jon agak, Nad bin ak dɨpan, ak teplep ma mɨdeb agak. Anɨb agek, Helod ne agek, bɨne okok kɨli Jon nop dɨl nag tun gɨl, dam nag lɨlak. Helod ne Jon nop pɨsnep paklen kumaŋ agɨl gos nɨgak ak pen, binɨb okok Jon nop bɨ God gos ñek agñeb chɨn agɨlak tek, Helod ne pɨlɨkɨl Jon nop ma paklak.
